name: Evasion Type Body Armors Index
description: Index of pure evasion type body armors focused on agility and dodge enhancement
general_description: Light shirts, agility vests, and movement-focused clothing designed for maximum mobility. These garments prioritize unrestricted movement and flexibility for agile combatants.
